text: Mixi keren xa yunubi raba naxa a niya faxɛ xa nɔ duniɲa ra, kɔnɔ Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa wali fɔxi dangi na ra pon! Adamadie naxee bara Ala xa hinnɛ sɔtɔ naxan dande mu na, a nun a xa tinxinyi a won kixi naxan na, nee nɔɛ sɔtɔma kisi kui mixi keren nan saabui ra, naxan findi Ala xa Mixi Sugandixi Isa ra.
